channel.title: CVE Feed for Mautic -- Mautic
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Mautic -- Mautic

item.title: CVE-2021-27913|2024-09-16T18:08:08.248Z -- mautic -- mautic
item.description: The function mt_rand is used to generate session tokens, this function is cryptographically flawed due to its nature being one pseudorandomness, an attacker can take advantage of the cryptographically insecure nature of this function to enumerate session tokens for accounts that are not under his/her control This issue affects: Mautic Mautic versions prior to 3.3.4; versions prior to 4.0.0.

item.title: CVE-2021-27912|2024-09-16T16:17:39.112Z -- mautic -- mautic
item.description: Mautic versions before 3.3.4/4.0.0 are vulnerable to an inline JS XSS attack when viewing Mautic assets by utilizing inline JS in the title and adding a broken image URL as a remote asset. This can only be leveraged by an authenticated user with permission to create or edit assets.

item.title: CVE-2021-27908|2024-09-16T16:23:48.079Z -- mautic -- mautic
item.description: In all versions prior to Mautic 3.3.2, secret parameters such as database credentials could be exposed publicly by an authorized admin user through leveraging Symfony parameter syntax in any of the free text fields in Mauticâ€™s configuration that are used in publicly facing parts of the application.

item.title: CVE-2021-27909|2024-09-16T20:52:58.796Z -- mautic -- mautic
item.description: For Mautic versions prior to 3.3.4/4.0.0, there is an XSS vulnerability on Mautic's password reset page where a vulnerable parameter, "bundle," in the URL could allow an attacker to execute Javascript code. The attacker would be required to convince or trick the target into clicking a password reset URL with the vulnerable parameter utilized.

item.title: CVE-2024-2731|2024-08-01T19:25:41.342Z -- mautic -- mautic
item.description: Users with low privileges (all permissions deselected in the administrator permissions settings) can view certain pages that expose sensitive information such as company names, users' names and surnames, stage names, and monitoring campaigns and their descriptions. In addition, unprivileged users can see and edit the descriptions of tags. At the time of publication of the CVE no patch is available.

item.title: CVE-2024-2730|2024-08-01T19:25:40.619Z -- mautic -- mautic
item.description: Mautic uses predictable page indices for unpublished landing pages, their content can be accessed by unauthenticated users under public preview URLs which could expose sensitive data. At the time of publication of the CVE no patch is available

item.title: CVE-2024-3448|2024-04-10T13:59:46.536Z -- mautic -- mautic
item.description: Users with low privileges can perform certain AJAX actions. In this vulnerability instance, improper access to ajax?action=plugin:focus:checkIframeAvailability leads to a Server-Side Request Forgery by analyzing the error messages returned from the back-end. Allowing an attacker to perform a port scan in the back-end. At the time of publication of the CVE no patch is available.

item.title: CVE-2024-2730|2024-04-10T13:59:36.195Z -- mautic -- mautic
item.description: Mautic uses predictable page indices for unpublished landing pages, their content can be accessed by unauthenticated users under public preview URLs which could expose sensitive data. At the time of publication of the CVE no patch is available
